content.p: The School of Medicine offers a large mix of undergraduate and postgraduate courses. You'll be taught by leading academics and clinicians and supported by world-class facilities. Our courses prepare you for the world of medicine. Embarking on higher education, whether at the undergraduate or postgraduate level, is a transformative experience. It equips students with the skills and knowledge they need to make a difference to not only their lives but to the lives of other people. Within the School of Medicine, we prepare our students for working in industry, academia and as professional medical doctors, ready to alleviate suffering and improve the health and well-being of those around us. --- Professor Claire Sharpe Dean of Education, School of Medicine Contacts: Call 0115 823 0031 ext.30031 or please see our 'contact us' page for further details
